## Introduction to tsviz

'tsviz' is an R package for Time Series Visualization - it contains the tsviz add-in and a sample dataset. It can be also used from the add-ins menu in R Studio; without loading the package with 'library()'.


#### Install and Load Packages

```{r}
# install.packages('tsviz')
# library(tsviz)

```



A data frame can be analyzed with tsviz if:
- it has at least one column of type 'Date'
- it has at least one column of type 'numeric'


#### Sample Use case 

```{r}

# prices <- crypto_prices
# tsviz()

```
